title: I Hate New Music: The Classic Rock Manifesto
description: (Book). Uproariously funny and relentlessly thought-provoking, I Hate New Music is one man's crusade against everything that isn't what rock ought to be. Author Dave Thompson examines the sacred cows of the past 30 years from U2 to Days of the New, from Radiohead to The White Stripes and then slaughters them for their sins against our souls in this un-put-downable compendium of outrageous opinion, hilarious anecdote, and wild accusations.
author: Dave Thompson
